1.title: Koala Country

episode of.title: Secret Life of the Koala (TV Series 2016)

1.plot: Koalas are synonymous with Australia--but few people realize that they only inhabit the eastern and southeastern regions of the country, where their very specific diet and tree-dwelling needs can be met.

2.title: Breeding Season

episode of.title: Secret Life of the Koala (TV Series 2016)

2.plot: Koalas aren't known for their high energy levels. All this changes during mating season, when males go on the prowl and females--some still raising last year's joey--choose a would-be suitor.

imdb.plot outline: Despite needing 18-21 hours of sleep a day , koalas are still capable of startling displays of energy, agility and aggression--especially around mating season. Get a closer look at the surprisingly rich and unexpected hidden lives of these iconic Australian marsupials in their natural habitat.
imdb.title: Secret Life of the Koala
